# SGE Live Peers
Here is a script for you to update `persistent_peers` setting with these peers in `config.toml`.

```
PEERS=a05353fe9ae39dd0edbfa6341634dec781d84a5c@65.108.105.48:17756,971643c5b9f9d279cfb7ac1b14accd109231236b@65.108.15.170:26656,eb61070abccf341053177285c2e0bc4ef8cd7a79@217.13.223.167:46656,2299d372bd2067b9fe05aacf94b3f2a5ad0f1b3b@212.8.240.13:2516,413128504de36317e3bf000073aa3165351e0d52@44.197.179.40:26656,4a3f59e30cde63d00aed8c3d15bef46b34ec2c7f@50.19.180.153:26656,12450c4223a2d6dcfbe5e9b9998cb67634cd2465@38.146.3.193:26656,5c240add1ea545da7082616d4fb7276371f0bf66@94.250.201.130:26656,27f0b281ea7f4c3db01fdb9f4cf7cc910ad240a6@209.34.205.57:26656,80973dcc0deb52ae96f80b9f147c3f601bea63fb@135.125.180.36:20656,7bd0d8c9a0cbfca490a8724a40252d01745c4f61@3.235.5.252:26656,95fb63fbf8ac2647fc4e6c9f73fd6db736bb28ed@52.55.235.60:26656,a6976d1348baf92d839edc11cd7a7476a120909b@18.207.110.2:26656,07fc54214e4f162d5d94607c83d2d6e0b256f161@52.44.14.245:26656,59d5ea1fa1f00b0004c2f9a4e4e480a33ddb86ad@159.223.47.239:26656,788bb7ee73c023f70c41360e9014544b12fe23f9@3.15.209.96:26656,445506c736895336e36dd4f8228a60c257b30e61@20.12.75.0:26656,3f75618555e4ba451c182c0110cea2ad1dcc34ee@143.244.188.95:26656,83765779af680d6dc2dd523c2f95ce541ed6a6e8@155.133.22.10:43956,8efece89a6fe7b1b4063b206a52d7dfca29e40ae@142.132.248.253:22656,08ba236f6392c80dd865d2fd84250cb6f016ab0b@35.174.81.173:26656,43b05a6bab7ca735397e9fae2cb0ad99977cf482@34.82.157.5:26656,7f11b740f21bde974f4ab29ce6d8d9d73a659f5c@135.181.5.47:10156,d79b994f1a31a59af7fcf89bba512d0c9afdc06d@94.130.219.37:26000,02a055a6d0ead952275d8dfacd22e4b8befc54bf@84.46.252.45:36656
sed -i.bak -e "s/^persistent_peers *=.*/persistent_peers = \"$PEERS\"/" $HOME/.sge/config/config.toml
```
